activities:
Axiom Consulting Partners LLC may use personal information to help us better understand our clients'/business partners'
needs and interests. Specifically, we may use the personal information to communicate with our clients, to deliver
consulting services to them, to bill them for consulting services they purchased, and to provide ongoing consulting services and support. We may also use their personal information to send them details of other consulting services that could be provided by our organization.
contactoff1: Axiom Consulting Partners LLC, Corporate Office
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All automatically and manually processed data is covered under our organization's self-certification.
